title: Battle Arena Toshinden Bonus Disc RARE! [PS1]
description: This disc, the "Battle Arena Toshinden Bonus Disc" was released in Japan, around Christmas time, 1994. It was a bonus disc that came with a Battle Arena Toshinden game information book - optional when you bought the game. This disc features "Watch Mode", and "VS Special" modes. This also features the very first ever seen of "large head mode" and Eiji Shinjo with a black outfit and red hair, and Ellis with a black outfit and black hair, along with silly character selection images rather than the original ones.
